reviews.review: One simply should not play the Competitive Mode on matchmaking. VAC clearly not functioning well. Every match there’s a cheater on the game whether in your team or opponent. And one more thing: This game has been invaded by Russians. They need to be eradicated first, then MM would be safe again.
Realy i miss for 1.6 old school , that was with out cheat

Its a very good and fun game!
